div.l: But if he wold be slayn · of Symkyn
With pavade with knyf or bodkyn
For Ialous folk · bien ꝑperilous eủermo
Algate they wolden · theyr wyves wenden so
And eeke for that she was sumdel smoterliche
She was as deynous · as water in a diche
And ful of hoker · and of bismare
Hir thought that a lady shuld hir spare
What for hir kynred · and hir nortelerye
The she hadde lierned · in the nonnerye
A doughter had they betwixt hem twoo
Of twenty yeere · withouten any mo
Savyng a chield · that was of half yeere of age
In cradil lay · and was a propir page
This wenche thikke · and wele I growe was
With Camuse nose and eyen gray as glas
With buttokes brode · and brestis round and hie
But right was was faire was hir her · I wil nat lie
The ꝑperson of the towne · for she was so faire
In purpose was · to maken hir his heyre
Both of his catel · and of his messuage
And straunge he made it · for hir mariage
His purpos was · to bistow hir hie
In to som worthy bloode · of auncestrie
For holy chirche goode · must be dispended
On holy chirche bloode · that is descendid
Therfor he wold · his holy bloode honoure
Though that holichirche · shuld deuoure
Grete soken had this Miller · al aboute
